|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = |rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad3oui = |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 3 |rad3rxchains = 3 |rad3sstreams = 3 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam3 = |rad3n = 450 |rad3g = 54 |rad3b = 11 |rad3freq = 2.4 |rad3correv = |rad3cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 1300Mbps max. PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, 600Mbps
max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = ''3200Mbps'' class :(2x 5GHz [11an+ac], 1x 2.4GHz [11bgn]) used are (''FullMAC'' arch. targeted) BCM43602s. :BCM43602 is supported in the mainline ''Linux'' kernel by [[brcmfmac]]. ===Specifications=== *AC3200 Tri Band Wireless Router :Three concurrent WiFi bands maximize device networking speeds :AC3200: 1300 Mbps AC1 + 1300 Mbps AC2 + 600 Mbps N bands *SmartConnect automatically migrates faster AC devices to :the highest performing WiFi AC band *Beamforming technology increases real-time performance by :directing stronger wireless signals to your specific location *Extreme performance 1 GHz dual core processor *SuperSpeed USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 share ports *Pre-encrypted WiFi for your convenience *Create isolated guest networks *All Gigabit wired ports :[http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-828DRU Product page] | [http://www.trendnet.com/support/supportdetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-828DRU Product images] :Availability: Available from retailers and other partners :Warranty: 3 year limited, MSRP: USD 279.99 ==Links of Interest== [http://www.trendnet.com/press/releases/view.asp?id=2783 PR on ''TRENDnet''] ===Rewiews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32719-trendnet-tew828dru-ac3200-tri-band-wireless-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A @1GHz Dual Core :*RAM: 512MB - 2x 256MB (EM6GD16EWXC-12H) ?? :*Flash: 128MB :*WLAN 2.4GHz: 1x [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 ::''Skyworks'' SE2623L 2.4GHz power amps (x3) ::''Skyworks'' SKY13377 6GHz SPDT switch (x3) :*WLAN 5GHz: 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 ::''Anadigics'' AWL5911 5GHz Power Amps (x6) :*PCIe: ''PLX Technology'' PEX8603 3-lane, 3-port PCIe switch ==See also== *[[TRENDnet TEW-804UB]] FCC ID: XU8TEW804UB 07/18/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-805UB]] FCC ID: XU8TEW805UB 03/27/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-806UBH]] FCC ID: XU8TEW806UBH 05/30/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-807ECH v1.0R]] FCC ID: XU8TEW807ECH 12/19/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-809UB]] - ''AC1900 USB Adapter'' [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32914-trendnet-unveils-ac1900-usb-adapter PR] *[[TRENDnet TEW-810DR]] FCC ID: XU8TEW810DR 10/17/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-811DRU]] FCC ID: XU8TEW1200AC 04/23/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-812DRU v1]] FCC ID: XU8TEW1750AC 12/17/2012 *[[TRENDnet TEW-812DRU v2]] FCC ID: XU8TEW1750ACV2 08/15/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-813DRU V1.0R]] FCC ID: XU8TEW813DRU 04/25/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-814DAP V1.xR]] FCC ID: XU8TEW814DAP 08/22/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-818DRU V1.0R]] FCC ID: XU8TEW818DRU 01/15/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-820AP V1.0R]] FCC ID: XU8TEW820-821 08/28/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-823DRU V1.xR]] FCC ID: XU8TEW823824 08/28/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-827DRU]] - ''AC2600 StreamBoost MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' [http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-827DRU PPage] :Quad-stream AC2600: 1733Mbps on 5GHz and 800Mbps on 2.4GHz :[[Qualcomm]] &1.4GHz dual-core processor, 2x USB 3.0 ports [[Category:English Documentation]]
